snippet.title: OVERRIDER - First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
OVERRIDER is an action-adventure roguelike. Ride across the remains of an advanced civilization and fight off a robot invasion. Perform tricks to charge your abilities, improve your skills, and craft gadgets to gain new ones. Can you outrun the threat?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2238160/OVERRIDER/

Sign up for our Kickstarter mailing list: http://eepurl.com/hybtx9 

Don't be a stranger! Join our community and share your feedback: https://discord.gg/bkYDq8v

Press kit:
https://dreamteck.io/overrider/presskit

Feel free to re-upload this trailer on your channel or platform. Download high quality here: https://dreamteck.io/overrider/presskit/trailers/OVERRIDER_-_Gameplay_Trailer_-_September_2023.mp4
